name: Amerindien Game
description:
This game is only in french, sorry for those who will not understand all.

Amerindien tribu is a game which you'll have to survive to the european invasion.

Preserve your chef tepee, or you will lose.

To do that, build useful tepee, create warriors to defend it, and voila !

Good luck have fun

Hope you will enjoy it

Please leave me a comment, i will appreciate that, thanks.
